special_attacks: breath weapon (40-ft. cone, 6d10 fire, Reflex DC 19 half, usable every 1d4 rounds), lingering breath (2d6 fire, 5 rounds), mythic power (5/day, surge +1d8), swallow whole (1d6 bludgeoning and 1d6 fire damage, AC 18, 16 hp)
melee: bite +18 (2d6+10 plus grab), 2 claws +18 (1d8+8 plus grab), tail slap +13 (1d8+12), 2 wings +13 (1d6+4)

spells.sorcerer spells known:
(CL 1st; concentration +3)

1st (3/day)-shield, true strike

0 (at will)-mage hand, message, prestidigitation, read magic

feats: Cleave, Improved InitiativeM, Improved Vital Strike, Iron WillM, Power AttackM, Vital Strike
senses: blindsense 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., low-light vision, smoke vision, x-ray vision; Perception +15

sections.body: A very young red dragon can see perfectly in smoky conditions (such as those created by pyrotechnics).
sections.name: Smoke Vision

sections.body: A young mythic red dragon is the offspring of an older mythic dragon, inheriting its power and rage. It tends to gorge itself on livestock, then sleep for nearly a year, only to repeat this cycle when it awakens again.

name: Red Dragon, Young, Mythic
skills: Appraise +15, Bluff +16, Fly +9, Intimidate +16, Perception +15, Sense Motive +15, Stealth +11
